sqlMap.insert:
insert into address_list
name = #name#
mobile = #mobile#
dept_id = #deptId:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select: select id as id, name as name, mobile as mobile, dept_id as deptId from address_list order by id asc
select a.id as id, a.name as name, a.mobile as mobile, a.dept_id as deptId, d.department as dept from address_list a left join department d on a.dept_id = d.id order by id asc
select id as id, name as name, mobile as mobile, dept_id as deptId from address_list where id = #id:INTEGER# order by id asc

#ids[]#
sqlMap.select: select a.id as id, a.name as name, a.mobile as mobile, a.dept_id as deptId, d.department as dept from address_list a left join department d on a.dept_id = d.id where a.name like '%$keyword$%'
